bioAsHtml: I am a data scientist / software engineer building products for mobility analytics and providing mobility insights using real-time high volume data sourced from Swisscom's mobile network. Before joining Swisscom, I was a research staff member working on machine learning and information retrieval at IBM Research.

acceptedTalks.title: LuceneRDD for (Geospatial) Search and Entity Linkage

bio: I am a data scientist / software engineer building products for mobility analytics and providing mobility insights using real-time high volume data sourced from Swisscom's mobile network. Before joining Swisscom, I was a research staff member working on machine learning and information retrieval at IBM Research.
